original: induction l1 as [|x l1 IHl1] using permutation_ind; induction l2 as [|y l2 IHl2] using permutation_ind. - reflexivity. - inversion H0. - inversion H. - simpl. apply (permutation_trans (l1 ++ a :: l :: l2) (l1 ++ l :: l2) (l1 ++ l :: a :: l2)). apply (permutation_app_comp l1 (a :: l ++ l2) l (l1 ++ l2)). apply IHl1. apply permutation_swap.
